welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Port Angeles, the charming city known for its stunning coastal views, rich history, and outdoor adventures. We're excited to have you here and invite you to explore and discover all that this beautiful destination has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fairchild International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fairchild International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Victoria Inner Harbor Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Floatplane Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for floatplane flights to and from nearby destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
